website_summaries.verdict: Thermos has increased liquid capacity of 26 oz., making this an ideal choice to use in bringing drinks on-the-go.
pros: Available in several different colors and has a screw-top that closes completely, preventing spills
Lid has opening to make it more convenient to carry
Keeps drinks hot or cold for long periods of time, even in extreme weather conditions
cons: Lid may squeak when it’s being screwed on and opened

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great, but longevity not so great
customer_reviews.text: First off, I loved this water bottle when I first got it. Great capacity, keeps water cold all day, just feels like a nice product. The reason I'm giving it two stars is because I've taken very good care of it and after 6 months of use, it's rusting from the inside, and Yeti's warranty won't cover "breakdown of materials over time". Not something I expect to see from a $40 bottle. I'll be switching to a different brand for my next bottle, I suggest you do the same if you want something that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Penny A. Helfrick

customer_reviews.title: not a real Yeti
customer_reviews.text: I heard how other reviewers said they didn't get the real deal and it was a fake. I think that is the case for my purchase, too. It doesn't keep anything cold for as long as it's supposed to. Ice melts in it within 4 hours. Having learned my lesson, I went to REI to purchase a real Yeti. To compare, the REI Yeti keeps ice over night and the water is still nice and cold. Lesson learned, won't buy a Yeti from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: goofy2113

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the vessel and color, but the black screw lid squeaks! I decided on a YETI because it is stainless steel. After my cancer I am removing almost all plastic from my life. I purchased the white because others at work have the stainless color and they are always mixed up! It is truly 'over the nose' which I love because I use this as my water bottle. Filtered water out of the fridge stays cool from 6:30 am to noon. However, I cannot give it 5 stars because the black screw on lid squeaks loudly, like it is rubbing, when I put the top on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $40
customer_reviews.text: So first how long stay cold test is ok. 4 ice cubes in 10oz cold water, 8 hours later no ice but still cold. Comparing to HiWill (24oz) which did the same test and still had 4 ice cubes 48 hour later. Won’t fit in cup holder the stock pictures are Deceiving. Have the magnetic cap coming, real only reason trying a double in cost vs HiWill. Will update if I loose cold time with the accessory top. Update: overpriced garbage, don’t hold ice for 8 hours. Seeing moisture in my second pic, tells me poor insulation. Without gunkote to seal this would suck more. The name is like buying a apple, overprice with better options at a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I love the 26oz
customer_reviews.text: I'm personally a fan of Yeti products. They are well made and really do keep my ice/drinks cold even on the hottest days in the sunshine on the beach. I love the 26oz. It's great to take along in the car and I don't have to worry about liquid spilling all over the place. And I LOVE the black! I was lucky enough to purchase during a sale, so the price point was great too.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Problems
customer_reviews.text: Dear sirs, I have purchased YETI mug from Amazon to present for my friend in Thailand. However my friend told me about this mug cannot keep temperatures and have droplet at outside surface. Could you suggest for clear this problem. Thank you very much. Best regards
customer_reviews.author: Nattaporn

customer_reviews.title: YETI Rambler 26 oz.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made in months. I got a YETI Rambler 20oz for a Christmas gift and love it; took it to work every day and found the only thing wrong with it was it was only 20oz--not enough iced coffee to last through the day. The 26 oz YETI was the answer to a dream! Double-wall stainless steel, who could want more?
customer_reviews.author: Arnold H.

customer_reviews.title: but not great as a thermos
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a quality product, but not great as a thermos. I use this for coffee, which I drink from a cup. It does a great job keeping the coffee hot but getting the coffee into this cup from the Yeti is the problem. It doesn't pour without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: KRichard

customer_reviews.title: I guess Yeti is going downhill.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace one that was stolen and this one is substandard. It doesn’t keep cold as well as my other ones. The outside even sweats, which shouldn’t happen on a vacuum sealed bottle. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Either a knock-off or Yeti's quality has gone downhill
customer_reviews.text: A huge fan of Yeti's products and everything they have put out so far exceeded my expectations. Their coolers, Hoppers and Ramblers have been incredible That is why I am so disappointed with with this YETI Rambler 26oz Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Bottle with Cap. Quite frankly, for the price plus the purchases of an additional functional cap I expected that this would at least hold ice overnight in an air conditioned hose...Not a chance. This is terrible and my inexpensive Costco purchase works 10x better. I have asked for a replacement because I refuse to believe Yeti would put out such a terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Pros & Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pro- It's durable & Yeti offers 26oz, unlike most thermos brands. Con- It's heavy. By the time, I add water to my 26oz, it almost weighs close to 2lbs! I use this for home or work. For outdoor activities, I use my Hydro Flask (s). Both are great for hot or cold drinks. My biggest issue w/ Yeti, is i wish they just made a boot for them. I don't need a carrier all the time. But i would like the bottom steel to be protected.
customer_reviews.author: Rewa

customer_reviews.title: doesn't stay cold
customer_reviews.text: While it is leak proof and easy to clean and easy to hold it doesn't stay cold. I've had a yeti cup that I use for the last 2 years that I bought at a KMART. and my cup keeps ice from melting for more than 8 hours. Even when left sitting in a hot car, if the ice melts my cup keeps my water cold. I bought this water bottle for my son expecting the same but the ice melts within just a few hours and the water gets warm shortly thereafter. I'm very disappointed in the product and will be looking for something else to keep him hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Sureina

customer_reviews.title: It's Yeti, of course it's good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product, but that shouldn't be a surprise. Yeti doesn't make bad stuff. Needed a new thermos for coffee, and this holds a lot and keeps it hot lot enough to have an afternoon cup from a 9am fill. I will say it doesn't pour well, that would be it's downside. Since it's wide mouth it doesn't lend itself to a dripless pour, so it drips every single time I fill my mug. And the lid is rather big, so it has a lot of drippy condensation to manage when you remove, as well. So basically it works great, just be prepared so you don't drip coffee and coffee-water all over the papers on your desk at work.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: This water bottle scares me. Is it poisoning me?
customer_reviews.text: Yeti should stick to coolers & stop making water bottles & coffee tumblers. This one is at least better insulated than the super crappy coffee mug that leaks & cant keep a drink warm for long at all. However, no matter how many times I thoroughly wash & rinse it, & fill it with filtered water, my water tastes like chemicals & scares me in this water bottle. I fear it will ultimately impact my health.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Yeti never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water bottle. I own several different sizes/versions of the Yeti's and I like this one for traveling. The screw top allows me to just throw it my backpack and not worry about leaks or spills. It keeps my water cold and the ice fresh. The screw is a little loud when turning to take it off/put it on, but I still give 5 stars. Product arrived on time and I would order again as well as recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Weisenreder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bottle
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint with Yeti tumblers is that they leak, even with the closing lid. This bottle fixes that issue, and keeps ice for even longer! The only thing to be aware of is it is quite thick, so some cup holders (like in my car) will not fit this bottle. Not a big issue for me, though, since I keep it in my backpack a lot of the time. The wide mouth makes it fairly easy to clean, just make sure you take off the rubber parts on the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit ANY cup holder
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this tumbler keeps everything super cold/hot and that I can use the Yeti straw adapter top, but this thing is so wide it doesn’t fit in any standard cup holder. I have the 30oz as well and that is spouted at the bottom to fit standard car cup holders, but for some reason the 26 oz rambler isn’t. It doesn’t fit in my car, my backpack, diaper bag, or parent console in the stroller, which makes it extremely inconvenient. I don’t understand why Yeti doesn’t reconfigure it tonfit standard cup holders. I’m on the lookout for something better suited for travel, but it’ll do for now.
customer_reviews.author: David B Godfrey Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice ergonomics, but had streaks after washing
customer_reviews.text: The bottle itself is pretty nice with the drinking cap ($15 separately...boo). That said, it claims to be dishwasher safe and to not have issues with streaking, but after the first time running it through the dishwasher it immediately had streaks. Not the biggest deal, but considering it claims to be safe from that exact problem, I was somewhat disappointed. Overall a nice bottle, but I don't know that it's worth the price tag compared to other bottles. Don't believe the marketing about the colors being streak-proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Water Bottle I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best water bottle I've ever purchased, totally worth the price. It keeps water cold (without ice) for really long periods of time. I can fill it up before I go to sleep and 8 hours later when I wake up it's still pretty damn cold. Perfect for road trips and hitting the gym. The only thing I don't like about it is the circumference. It's pretty large for my hand and holding it with one hand while drinking is a little awkward. And it won't fit in every car cupholder due to its size, but I love this Yeti and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: How do you pour out of this thing?
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size for a coffee thermos and it keeps my beverage warm, but I spill every time I try to pour from it. Make sure you bring napkins or pour outside because the inside threads and wide mouth will dribble down the side every time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: ****METALLIC TASTE****
customer_reviews.text: ****METALLIC TASTE**** Put filtered water in bottle and used a couple hours later, water tasted very metallic. The manufacturer claims it's stainless steel although since it's made in China who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Troy S.

customer_reviews.title: Chill and Be Ice
customer_reviews.text: It just works, plain and simple. It has held ice cubes in there for multiple days with barely any meltage when left in the room. When I put it in the refrigerator, after a week the ice cubes in there barely even melted so I just put another ice cube in and it's full up on ice again.
customer_reviews.author: Jungle Druid

customer_reviews.title: Read the seller's words carefully!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my YETI. The buyer failed to disclose it did not come with the spout (lid). When I got it home, I was extremely disappointed. I had to go the YETI site to purchase the lid. The product is original but an older version. I ended paying more for this bottle through Amazon that if I had purchased it at YETI or a sporting store.
customer_reviews.author: Reina Del Rio

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the Ozark Trail 32 oz version similar. It was good and I've used it a LOT, even dropping it a few times and banging it up a bit. But the Yeti just has a touch more quality to it. The lid feels a little more solid and the handle's a little wider. I use it day in and out and it is holding up awesome. The oversized opening in the top is great to drink out of. The powder coating also seems to be good quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tryp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my Yeti 26oz Rambler! It holds an awesome amount of coffee and keeps it hot throughout the day. I purchased the "Hot Shot" cap for it and love that too! It's much easier to drink from with that on, and no need to keep unscrewing the handle top that comes with it, which would be inconvenient. I also purchased a silicone handle for it. The handle makes it SO much easier to hold, it's neutralizes the weight when carrying the bottle, and looks so awesome too! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: H. S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic as a Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use as a water bottle with the addition of the screw in bottle top. The Rambler can also be used for hot beverages and soup when the supplied cap is used. I packed the Ramble full of ice and added water. I used it as a water bottle during the day but left it in the truck overnight. The ice had melted but the water was still ice cold the next day. Needles to say I am happy with the purchase. The bottle fits in my cup holder which is a big plus for the capacity of the Rambler. The handy lid/hand grip works better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: OGauge4Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water bottles
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the 26oz and the 18oz YETI Rambler Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Bottles for my son and myself. Striving to be more environmentally friendly as well as more health-conscious by giving up on disposable plastic water bottles. YETI makes an excellent product which I endorse 100%. Happy to be doing our little part in trying to protect our planet and our health! :)
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: Tough, heavy duty bottle
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Keeps very cold, nice beefy handle on carry lid, solid construction, tight seal, nice rounded edge (more pleasant to drink from), nice wide opening. Cons: It's heavier than other vacuum bottles I've owned (yes I did weigh them). No doubt due to the tougher construction. Also, not as easy as others to get the rubber seals out for cleaning. Verdict: If you are going ultra-light I wouldn't recommend. But otherwise it's my primary go-to vacuum bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Yeti!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! Best part is just how long it keeps my water cold. I always add ice, but with the chugger lid, I get the perfect refreshing drink every time! Wish they weren't so expensive, because I'd buy a lot more. Great gifts for people who can't or won't buy it for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Tonn

customer_reviews.title: Great Invention
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest invention. I've had several Yetis and love their ability to keep things cool. They are not lying about the leak proof!! I've filled it to the brim and turned it upside down and nothing comes out. I've had it in my motorcycle bag and it's great because it doesn't sweat or leak and keeps cold liquids cold and hot liquids hot. Plan to use it hiking.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Young

customer_reviews.title: Rust inside at bottom
customer_reviews.text: Love yeti products and have multiple water bottles and coffee mugs, and have never experienced rust at the bottom of any of them. I even asked multiple family members who also use yeti products and they have also never experienced this. Iv only had this a few months and only put water and ice in it. I don't know if this is a knock off yeti or what but will never buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Teeters

customer_reviews.title: Better than the hydro
customer_reviews.text: As a big fan of Hyrdroflasks (I own 5 of them), I got this Yeti simply to try. I had no expectations. After using it for over a month, it's now my go-to water bottle. I like it better than my Hydroflasks. Why? It's slimmer and tougher. The lid is sturdier too. The slimness makes it fit more easily in all my backpacks, as well as cup holders. The main con is that it's only 26oz (6 oz less than my Hydros).
customer_reviews.author: Alex Theis

customer_reviews.title: he got me my own and I LOVE it. Customer service is great to work with ...
customer_reviews.text: Literally will keep ice for dayssssss. My husband has one and I was "borrowing" his so much, he got me my own and I LOVE it. Customer service is great to work with (had to replace his cap when he dropped it and cracked the handle; sent a new cap free of charge super fast). The only thing with the white coating, it's already scratched, but i'm not surprised by that.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bartrom

customer_reviews.title: Yetis are Forever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for me and have found it extremely useful. My husband, who tends to be skeptical, was so impressed with it that I purchased a second one for him. This being said, we also have a yeti ice chest. Yeti products ar expensive but they are life long products. These bottles keep ice for 24 hours. I take mine whenever I’m driving in my car and also outside when working in the garden. These would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tortilla maker

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I love Yeti products and this bottle is exactly what I need in a bottle.... or so I thought. When used with ice and water the ice will not keep for more than 1 1/2 hours. When used with hot drinks (which is mainly what I purchased it for) my hot drink will be ice cold in under a hour. I was very much dissapointed in the product and can’t believe it’s performance. I suspect it could be a defective unit but maybe this particular bottle just does not hold up to the Yeti name. Either way I am very dissapointed. Update: Yeti confirmed it is a warranty issue and is replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: DAHC

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOOOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps hot liquids hot and cold liquids cold for hours. SUCH a cute color. Large handle makes it easy to carry around (the handle on my previous bottle could only fit 1 finger). The mouth is large enough so that I can easily clean the inside with my regular dish wand (yet another issue with my previous bottle, the mouth was too small). I've had Hydroflasks and some other off brand and Yeti is by far my favorite!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Collette

customer_reviews.title: Great insulation for cold drinks
customer_reviews.text: I love this Yeti bottle, I fill it half full of ice and then add my water every night for my sips throughout the night. There is still ice in it all throughout the following day! Stays amazingly cold for 24 hours. Now I use it for road trips, but it will not fit In the cup holders in our vehicles. So I wedge it between me and seat belt for quick access. Well worth the money for this purchase, wonderful quality. I have dropped it several times, not even a dent shows!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a Yeti. It works.
customer_reviews.text: It is a Yeti. It does exactly what it says it will do at a price point an order of magnitude above most competitors. If you don't mind the cost you will never be disappointed with the performance. Keeps hot stuff hot a good long time and cold stuff cold even longer. The finish is definitely very durable. Would buy again but hope I won't need to.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Performs like a Yeti should.
customer_reviews.text: Was so tired of competing brands falling apart on me. I have a Yeti cup already so it was a natural progression to go to the 26 oz Rambler. I also got the mag lid to go with it since I like drinking out of a smaller hole but I love the carry handle on the original lid. All around another solid Yeti product to add to my collection. My 16 year old loves it enough to get her own.
customer_reviews.author: 3musketeers

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: This one is very large around and harder to hold but it’s not a huge deal. It’s a great item to have. I’ve tried knock off or other brands of metal bottles but nothing compares to how long a Yeti can keep my drinks cold. I only drink iced water and this helps a lot. Bought one for my Dad for Christmas because he’s refused to spend the money on himself. He’s going to be stoked.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Kerg

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect to be able to drink your hot or cold beverage on the run or on the go..the opening is only a screwtop and it’s very large and you’ll spill it all over yourself especially if you’re driving, or doing anything except sitting very still.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: About the size of two regular bottles, this item is good if you are leaving the day to do chores and are gonna be gone for half the day. I’ll fill it up once more later on in the evening and meets my daily water needs. It is sturdy...and when paired with this silicone handle purchased also on amazon, it’s easily carried. My only concern is the thickness of the bottle...but the silicone handle makes it easily manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Yeti Quality, As Always
customer_reviews.text: As always, Yeti has a nice quality product. I love how the rim contours to my lips, which prevents water from spilling out...basically I never have a drinking problem with this Rambler. I have kind of small hands and I find it comfortable to grip and hold onto this bottle. It for sure keeps liquids hot or cold for a long period of time. The cap works well and is easy to screw on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Student_of_Life

customer_reviews.title: Great product holds temperature for several hours
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted one of these yetis, finally splurged and bought one. They really do keep things cold and hot for long periods of time. Out performs anything I’ve ever had, I use mostly for cold. For hot you might want to buy the coffee lid so you don’t get coffee dripping from your lid with the one that comes with this product is a screw cap and it has residual coffee on it every time you screen off the cap other than that great product
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sigala

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bottle- just a little large for small hands
customer_reviews.text: YETI products never cease to amaze me. This bottle keeps my beverages cold all day. I highly recommend getting the mag top lid for ease of use. My only complaint, is that its very large for my small hands. I've tried to use the para cord handles, but they allow the bottle to leak. So, I picked up a silicone handle and it's a must if you have small hands! The circumference of the bottle also is too large to fit in most automobile cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: D. Zannelli

customer_reviews.title: Durable and keeps my drinks cold (Burrr)
customer_reviews.text: I use this every single day and it works like a charm. However, it DOES retain smells from previous beverages so he aware. For some reason after mixing my BCAAs in my Rambler then leaving it for about 5 hours there was a fishy smell left after cleaning it out.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Funte

customer_reviews.title: The Best out there.
customer_reviews.text: Yeti Rocks, I can fill this rambler the night before school, put it in my son's backpack and it stays cold the entire next day. I purchased the bottle chug cap to go with it. It makes it easy to add ice and then drink when the lid is installed. I only wish you could add engraving to something like this, just a thought.
customer_reviews.author: F1

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible! I never thought I’d spend more than $5 on a bottle... but I’m so glad I did. Unfortunately, mine was stolen a couple of months ago. I thought I could get by with a cheaper one to replace it... a Contigo. I was wrong. I’ll be buying another one of these very soon!
customer_reviews.author: Mike V

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for your vacuum insulated needs
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I'm a little let down by this water bottle. I got the 26oz Rambler in stainless steel. I had an off brand one a few years ago that would keep ice frozen for more than a day. With this guy I'm lucky if it lasts a couple hours... In addition that I can feel the exterior of the bottle get cold when I put ice in it. If it's truly vacuum insulated I don't think it's supposed to do that. The design is great, but the for what it's supposed to do, which is keep water ice cold for an extended period of time, I'd look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: chill and heat
customer_reviews.text: After my sister and brother in law started bragged about they Yeti rambler and tumbler, I decided to get one I that was big enough to hold enough beverage so I wouldn't have to get up to make multiple trips to refill. Bingo. This gem is large enough that I can carry it around easily and enough volume of coffee/water/margarita/whatever that I can sit and have it last a while. The cold with ice lasts a while . The hot coffee/tea stays it a few hrs. Yep. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Wide mouth 26 oz Yeti Rambler
customer_reviews.text: Price: A bit pricier than Hydroflask. I wanted the Tahoe Blue which was running for $54.99 however, after waiting, finally got it for $39.99. Wish it were cheaper...sigh. Quality: The Yeti feels much heavier and more well-built than the Hydroflask. Slipped mine into a JugLug Sleeve to protect it from any dings. The bottle mouth is wide enough to fit my hand to wash it in...no bottle brush for this Yeti. Able to keep crushed ice with water cold for 24 hours in my office. Size: The 26 oz is perfect for me. Not too big where it will be too heavy to carry around and not too small where I need to constantly refill.
customer_reviews.author: hokumom

customer_reviews.title: best I have used
customer_reviews.text: I was looking a nice bottle to take water to work each day. Tried several types and sizes. This 26 oz is perfect. Keeps water cold, easy to clean and the wide mouth works perfectly. I like this wider mouth for over the nose when drinking, no spills. Great design. Glad I got it as I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Took

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the Yeti. Everything about it feels solid, quality and comfortable. The rambler itself and the lid. Does a great job holding ice and keeping your drink very cold. It gives you a confidence it will do everything it promises. They're expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: A bit large, but still a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love my Yeti. It truly keeps my ice water cold for hours. I probably didn't need a 26 ounce flask, and it doesn't quite fit in my car's cup holder, but I still love it. I also bought the flip top sipping cap which is really handy to get a quick sip in without ha ing to unscrew the cap. I bring this with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: SMFitz

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be authentic. Holds ice well
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be an authentic YETI Filled it with ice upon arrival and let it sit for 12 hours at room temperature. After 12 hours only a little ice had melted. I did also buy the yeti chug cap from Dick's sporting goods as it was $6 cheaper there than Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Rob K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing insulation and great textured exterior
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing at keeping liquids cool. I can leave this in my car all day at work (in a Texas summer) and have cold water on the way home. The exterior texture is great to touch, and it's pretty tough, although I have collected a couple scratches. The cap that comes with it is nice, but my wife uses the small-mouth chug caps. The only insulated bottles and mugs I'll every buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jake North

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep ice cold!
customer_reviews.text: The yeti we received was either defective or a knockoff. It would not keep ice cold very well. We compared it to another rambler we had at our house and the ice completely melted away in this yeti and it barely melted in our other one. We ended up doing an exchange directly to Yeti and the new rambler we received finally worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tim J

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the stainless steel rambler, easy to clean better than hydroflask.Don't get me wrong HF also maintain its' coldness but i get tired of it. I think Yeti is easier to clean .I have the buy the zip type so i can compare the 2.But HF zip lid most of the time hard to use with shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My order was sold by “Pronghorn Outfitters” and it’s definitely a real Yeti product. Keeps my drinks extremely cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Dents easily
customer_reviews.text: Don’t drop it, or you’ll dent the deceptively solid exterior, which also causes the bottle to lose some of its insulating value, but you’ll have this issue with all the big brands you’ll find. Overall, it’s far superior to plastic bottles, but nothing special compared to the cheaper similar brands you’ll find here.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: My best friend
customer_reviews.text: I use this EVERY. SINGLE. DAY.!!! I'm a water nut so this thing is a lifesaver! I take it everywhere and I bought the water bottle spout attachment so its amazing. I left it at a friend's by mistake and when I came to get it the next day the ice wasn't melted. Seriously amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Yeti Fanatics
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was addicted to Gatorade. I was really sick of buying it, plus he was ruining his teeth. He is overall very cheap and almost a bum except when it comes to Yeti and Costa. Then, he is a real tool. Anyway, I got him this hoping he would drink more water. Good God, he does! I laugh. Well worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: rollingblubber

customer_reviews.title: Hots hot, colds cold
customer_reviews.text: You will not be disappointed with this purchase. I'm an avid motorcycle rider and whether it's coffee or a cold drink Yeti keeps it just the way it should be. I ride a black Harley and the saddle bags can get pretty hot during the summer. I've had my Yeti keep ice in my power aide for over 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than our other Yetis
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think it will fit in car’s cup holder. As long as it’s leak proof, won’t be a problem. This clay color was much cheaper. Wonder if color didn’t sell well. Color is not a problem with us. It’s actually about the color of peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Jiji

customer_reviews.title: My first Yeti product, and omg my drinks are ...
customer_reviews.text: My first Yeti product, and omg my drinks are getting colder. Iced tea will never be the same again. Actually frosting up around the ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin V.

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing, works even better
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, works even better. This bottle keeps drinks cold for hours in the hottest temperatures. I filled it with ice in the morning and left it in my car for eight hours on 90 degree day. I came back to ice cold water. Blown away by the performance of this product. As an added bonus, the matte black finish looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: KPL

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this Water Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this bottle, keeps my water cold all day, sometimes I have to add more ice, but for the most part cold all day. I purchase the Yeti cap that comes with 2 straws, so all I have to do suck to get the water instead of turn the bottle up, makes drinking my water easy!
customer_reviews.author: SueSue

customer_reviews.title: The best water-bottle I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I am not the one to write reviews, but this bottle deserves it. Me and this thing have been through a lot together. It has survived weeklong campouts, multiple shows where I worked backstage, and multiple journeys to NYC. It was there for my graduation from highschool, and was there when I first settled into my college dorm. There have been rough time where it has been knocked over, dropped, forgotten only to be found again, and there are now chips in the paint and dents in the metal. But it can easily keep up with my lifestyle, and I feel confident that this bottle will last me for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kreiser

customer_reviews.title: Last bottle you'll have to buy
customer_reviews.text: I use this bottle all day, every day. Helps me stay hydrated and helps to control blood sugars since I can carry it with me everywhere. Keeps cold liquids at good temp longer than any other bottle I've used. Yeti has a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: I’ve carried a water bottle everyday for the last 15 years and just bought the Yeti 26 oz. Out of all the bottles I’ve purchased over the years, this is by far the nicest bottle I’ve ever owned. I wish I would have discovered it sooner. I highly recommend buying the Sport cap for it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to purchase this product since I needed it so bad. It was a let down when I started using it. The coffee that I put in it barely stays warm. I’m not even asking for hot. I was even putting hot scolding water in it for a few minutes prior to putting coffee In it.
customer_reviews.author: antart22

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good insulation
customer_reviews.text: My sister gifted us a couple of these for Christmas last year, and being cynical I expected to underwhelmed. However, after nearly a year's use I've been continually impressed by how well they keep liquids insulated, so I purchased these as gifts to pass along. My only gripe is that it's a little challenging to open/close one-handed while driving, but I guess that's the compromise for a nice, solid seal with the cap, so it's completely tolerable. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Will Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased yeti products before and love there products
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased yeti products before and love there products! Quality is great and the top is wide open about 3 inches so you can easily put ice into it without ice falling everywhere. This Rambler also keeps drinks ice cold for as long as you need it. The price is a little high but for the quality I must agree it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Madden

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for taking along enough coffee for my morning at work. Love the hard handle that is part of the top. Makes carrying a breeze. Feels solid and that it will last for as long as I need it. Have only used it for hot coffee and it seems to keep it hot for a while.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: Some people think this is not the real deal, but if you’ve had a yeti bottle before, you will know right off the bat. This IS the real deal, works great, it also comes with the registration code and inserts that it should, rest assure, it’s authentic!
customer_reviews.author: nanners

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Day 3 with this vacuum bottle and it works perfectly. I purchased this bottle to store hot beverages and so far it keeps my beverage hot for 12hrs .I never tried it past the 12 hrs but if I do I will write a review on that.I love this vacuum bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: Keeps water cold, easy to carry and easy to clean! Wide mouth is easy for loading up with ice.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S

customer_reviews.title: Holds ice for days
customer_reviews.text: This thing holds ice for a observed amount of time. I definitely recommend it. One thing to note is when you are washing it make sure to take out the rubber gasket so bacteria dose the get trapped under there. Other than that it’s very easy to clean. This was my first yeti and since then I’ve bought 2 more cups. Also knock off brands don’t even come close to the quality and performance of an actually yeti. Trust me PAY ONCE CRY ONCE. It’s worth it and it will last you years.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable to retain heat after sipping.
customer_reviews.text: Keep cold items incredibly cold not so great with hot liquids. Once you open it to sip your hot beverage it’s HOT but after your forth or fifth sip the temperature drastically drops quickly even after I continued to place the lid back on after each sip. Fits in a cup holder great. Easy to transport. 5 stars for cold drinks but 3 for hot. It’s definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hydro flask but wasn't totally happy with its performance so purchased the Yeti Rambler. I have other Yeti products which have all been excellent so I wanted to give it a try. I am not disappointed! Good solid product that keeps my water cold for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, does what it’s meant to do.
customer_reviews.text: Great size yeti for the price. They were more expensive at sporting goods stores so I bought this one. Doesn’t leak at all and I bought the small adapter for it and it’s great. Dropped it several times and there isn’t a single dent in it. Keeps my cold drinks cold on a hot day and my hot drinks hot on a cold day.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Clinger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Essential
customer_reviews.text: i bought this over the summer as i was spending the summer on the coast. Therefore, i was spending alot of time on the beach, where i enjoyed having cold water. This could stay in the hot sand with the sun beating down on it all day and by the end of the day it is still cold. I also will fill this with coffee at the start of my 8 hour shift and by the end, whatever is left is still hot. I would easily pay much more for this product. the versatality of the lid is also awesome. I bought 2 other lids for this for different uses, and i love both of them
customer_reviews.author: Warner

customer_reviews.title: Dud. Possibly not a genuine yeti..doesnt hold to the usual yeti standards
customer_reviews.text: My husband thinks this is a fake Yeti. Im inclined to agree. We have other yetis and they will keep ice and beverages for hours. This one literally within the hour the ice is melted and the beverage does not stay cold. This one is a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Jdecember

customer_reviews.title: SUBSTANTIAL.
customer_reviews.text: It was tough to pull the trigger on this water bottle. The cost is absolutely nuts, but man does it back its price up. Sure, liquids will stay cold for generations to come, but the bottle itself is just awesome. It’s rugged, easy to hold, and has a great lip to drink from. I hope to never lose this. I certainly won’t break it.
customer_reviews.author: Slobes

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my yeti! I literally take this water bottle everywhere I go. I bought the straw lid, which is an amazing purchase along with the water bottle. I literally take this to the gym every day, to the beach, the church, on road trips, do you my shifts in the emergency department And this bad boy keeps water cold for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for several months and it has held up great. I carry it back and forth between yoga class and home, and despite my dropping it more times than I want to admit, it's held up perfectly. I didn't love the twist off/on cap that came with it so I bought the ramber bottle straw cap, and now I'd say its the perfect item. Besides, with the bright blue color, I'm less likely to leave it behind in the yoga studio!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep a lot of liquid hot or cold
customer_reviews.text: I like my coffee hot and I drink a few cups over several hours in the morning. This keeps my coffee nice and hot all morning. My only complaint is that I wish this poured better. Especially because the coffee is hot! It drips down the side after each pour so I have to wipe it each time. I'd love a top that you could pour through or a lip that didn't drip. This top screws on. It is leakproof when screwed closed. I can hold it any which way and it doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: joep

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I was very impressed with the build quality of this as well as it's ability to keep things cold for long periods of time. However, the straw cap which is required to drink directly out of the unit is sold separately and is not cheap. Since most other water bottles of this kind include a straw cap with the jar, this seems to be a pretty transparent money grab.
customer_reviews.author: E. Furan

customer_reviews.title: Yeti’s are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Yetis! This was my second. I bring it everywhere with me to stay hydrated and keeps ice for up to 2 days! Plus i got the cute purple color! The 26oz isnt too small that you’re always refilling and not so big that you cant drink with one hand!
customer_reviews.author: cccathyyy

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy how long ice will last in my rambler. It keeps ice for me all day and the converter lid ("Chug Cap") was a must have to make this more office friendly for me. Docked one star because it is a little heavy and dented when dropped on concrete. Overall happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job keeping my iced tea, iced
customer_reviews.text: Im a weirdo about keeping my fluids very cold. Ice typically last 24-30 hours. Easy to clean but def wider then most bottles so slightly difficult to hold. Still worth 5 stars ... but yeti products are way above most companies anyway
customer_reviews.author: brad w

customer_reviews.title: Warning! No Chug Cap!
customer_reviews.text: On Yeti's site, this product is described as having a chug cap. I ordered two of these bottles, and they came with some other cap. A chug cap is not sold as an accessory, so now I'm screwed.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL D PEARCE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Like the durability of the Yeti, and it's the perfect size for grip. The twist off cap can be a bit annoying at times. I would buy the replacement caps/straws but there way too expensive. Please lower the prices on those, Yeti .....
customer_reviews.author: G.N

customer_reviews.title: This bottle does exactly what it promises!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. We use it to keep our one year old’s milk cold while traveling, hiking or other adventures. His milk literally stays ice cold the whole time we are gone. This bottle makes traveling with a toddler so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: I love the color too !
customer_reviews.text: These seam expensive at first but the design is very very good ! I like cold water so with this when I add ice and water and go to bed , I still have ice in the morning. I also like how the lid stay screwed on till you say so . Easy to grasp the top when you are carrying a lot .
customer_reviews.author: VanessaAnnM

customer_reviews.title: Pro's and Con's
customer_reviews.text: The biggest pro is that my water stays cold at work all day. The biggest con is that this bottle is HEAVY! Not something I would want to put into a backpack and walk around with.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Beach Lover

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, it's a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bottle, I carry it around everyday at work. I put Ice in it and it'll last for hours and even sometimes a few days before completely melting. If I could go back in time the only thing I'd change is the color of it. White stains far too easy and it's hard to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Came with a broken lid
customer_reviews.text: I received my yeti bottle and upon taking it out of the packaging, I noticed a squeaking noice when I turned the lid, which was when I noticed a large crack along the handle of the bottle. I have another Yeti cup that I love, so I wanted to try another kind, but receiving one with a huge crack on the lid is rather upsetting. I'm not sure if I should be upset with the Yeti company or Amazon, but I am rather unhappy. The bottle itself is so pretty, and I love the color, but I don't know what to do about a bottle with a broken lid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my drinks cold all day.
customer_reviews.text: Super well designed and constructed. Looks fantastic. Holds a good amount and keeps contents cold all day. A little tough to get hand in the opening to wash the inside. And slightly heavy. But overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Zach

customer_reviews.title: Yeti excellence!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! Bought it for my teenage son to take to school. He Packs it with ice and water at 6am and when he brings it home after football practice at 7pm, it still has a ton of ice! What I expect from a Yeti! It was also shipped and received super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: YETI Rambler 26 oz Bottle, Vacuum Insulated, Stainless Steel with TripleHaul Cap
feature_bullets: DuraCoat Color that is built to last - no fading, peeling, or cracking here
Leakproof TripleHaul Cap protects your truck cab or day pack from spills; complete with 3-finger grip
This Double-Wall Vacuum Insulated water bottle has the power to keep your water cold (or coffee hot) until the last sip
18/8 stainless steel construction stands up to even the toughest of conditions
Dimensions: 9 1/2 in high, diameter of 3 in. Fits standard sized cup holders

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
